/usr/lib/nvidia-cuda-toolkit/bin/g++ CMakeFiles/MANDELBROT.dir/mandelbrot.cu.o -o MANDELBROT  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGL.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGLU.so /usr/local/lib/libglut.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libXi.so -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl  -L"/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/stubs"
